name: Wake Up (itch) (Gr0undC0ntr01)
description:
You wake up in a weird "house" being greeted by a ghost-like guide figure.

For some reason you already know that you need to get out of this place, but don't know how or why.

The ghost takes you on a small tour around the place, which consists of 4 different rooms. Each room contains a puzzle that requires you to follow both physical props and clues appearing on screen.

All the while, your guide will keep you entertained.

On completion of every puzzle you start to hear muffled voices trying to get through to you.

Maybe you should hurry up...
